name: Cargo Parking
description:
Become a pro truck driver, making deliveries and mastering your parking skills inthis new & realistic car simulation game. Become a true master at driving and learn to parkmultiple trucks on a timer. Test your skills and learn to park with the manual gear shift.

Drive safely and be careful not to crash. You’re driving a huge delivery vehicle, treat it like a proand be careful making turns! Parking this huge beast may not be easy, but take your time andsoon you’ll be driving trailer trucks like a real pro.

There is much to discover and do as you get better and better at your driving & parking job.Make delivery safe, finish your task in time, and you will get rewarded! Test your car & truckdriving skills and download the game now!

FEATURES:
- Multiple trucks to unlock & drive
- Smooth & simple controls
- Exciting time-based gameplay
- The ultimate parking challenge!

In Cargo Truck Parking there’s no place for getting bored. Drive, park, and have a great time asthe ultimate pro truck driver!

Good Luck Truckers!
